content: I think I'll ask participants to share their thoughts on the impact of sustainable packaging on the environment, and how they think beauty brands can improve their sustainable packaging practices. I'll also ask them to share their favorite eco-friendly beauty products and how they incorporate sustainable practices into their daily routines. Here's an example question: "What do you think is the most important aspect of sustainable packaging in the beauty industry? How can beauty brands improve their sustainable packaging practices? Share your thoughts! #SustainablePackaging #BeautyIndustry"
